
def isprime(n):
    if n%2 == 0: return False
    if n%3 == 0: return False

    i=5
    w=2
    while i*i <=n:
        if n%i == 0:
            return False
        i+=w
        w=6-w
    return True


N = int(raw_input())
if N%2 ==0:
    N+=1

flag=0
while 1:
    if str(N) == str(N)[::-1]:
        if isprime(N):
            print N
            flag=1
    if flag:
        break
    N+=2
